docs.text:
Overview


Finvu has implemented a FIP simulator based on the 
ReBIT API specs
 in order to test the APIs as part of the AA ecosystem. We have also provided an API for inputting source FI data considering different 
FIType
 and these would evolve as we move forward. Kindly refer to the details of the FIP Data API to know more. 


Since this is a closed user group the FIP simulator has support for 
http
 only and future support for 
https
 will be considered.


We are trying to keep upto the pace by implementing latest Rebit API specs for the FIP simulator, however if there any issues, do drop us a note at 
info@cookiejar.co.in


Version


Currently the FIP simulator adheres to the ReBit specs version 1.0.1


FIP Data API


Prior to using the FIP Simulator API, dummy FI data can be entered into FIP source data system using the 
FIP Data API


AA Data API


Prior to using the AA Sandbox API, dummy FI data can be entered into AA source data system using the 
AA Data API


API Key Request


In order to use the FIP and AA API an api key is required to be passed. 


Please send an email to 
info@cookiejar.co.in
 for the api key. 


Refer to the 
FIP API (Simulator)
 page for more information.


Refer to the 
AA API Sandbox
 page for more information.


Root API Endpoint


The root API end point is 
http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: Finvu has implemented a FIP simulator based on the  ReBIT API specs  in order to test the APIs as part of the AA ecosystem. We have also provided an API for inputting source FI data considering different  FIType  and these would evolve as we move forward. Kindly refer to the details of the FIP Data API to know more.   Since this is a closed user group the FIP simulator has support for  http  only and future support for  https  will be considered.  We are trying to keep upto the pace by implementing latest Rebit API specs for the FIP simulator, however if there any issues, do drop us a note at  info@cookiejar.co.in

docs.title: Root API Endpoint

docs.text:
FIP API (Simulator)


This is a simulator implementation of the FIP API and can be used for testing the Account Aggregator flows as part of the ecosystem. 


Request headers


Below 
http
 headers need to be set as part of each request








Key


Value










content-Type


application/xml






aa_api_key


Please email us on info@cookiejar.co.in for obtaining the key








API Request


The API URL to be used is 
<Root API Endpoint>/<FIP API>
 as per ReBIT FIP API Specs.


Account Discover


HTTP METHOD: 
POST


URL: 
http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/Accounts/discover


Request Body


<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<AccDiscoveryRequest xmlns="https://standards.rebit.org.in/aa" ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-05-22T17:30:15.239Z" 
txnid="8399263c-4a15-11e8-bcd1-0277a9fbfedc">
    <Customer id="cust123">
    </Customer>
    <Identifiers>
        <Identifier category="STRONG" type="MOBILE" value="7030608902"></Identifier></Identifiers>
    <FIPDetails name="HDFC" id="fipHDFC555">
        <FITypes>
            <FIType name="DEPOSIT" value="string"></FIType>
        </FITypes>
    </FIPDetails>
    <Meta type="PERSON" value="string">
        <DeviceInfo>
            <Tag name="MOBILE" value="string"></Tag>
            <Tag1 name="GEOCODE" value="string"></Tag1>
            <Tag3 name="LOCATION" value="string"></Tag3>
            <Tag4 name="IP" value="string"></Tag4>
            <Tag5 name="TYPE" value="string"></Tag5>
            <Tag6 name="ID" value="string"></Tag6>
            <Tag7 name="OS" value="string"></Tag7>
            <Tag8 name="APP" value="string"></Tag8>
            <Tag9 name="CAPABILITY" value="string"></Tag9>
            <Tag10 name="TELECOM" value="string"></Tag10>
        </DeviceInfo>
    </Meta>
</AccDiscoveryRequest>




Response Expected: 


<AccDiscoveryResponse ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-05-22T17:30:15.239+0000" txnid="8399263c-4a15-11e8-bcd1-0277a9fbfedc">
    <AuthenticatorType>TOKEN</AuthenticatorType>
    <DiscoveredAccounts>
        <Account FIType="DEPOSIT" accType="SAVINGS" accRefNumber="HDFC11111111" maskedAccNumber="XXXXXXXX1111"/>
    </DiscoveredAccounts>
    <DiscoveredAccounts>
        <Account FIType="DEPOSIT" accType="CURRENT" accRefNumber="HDFC22222222" maskedAccNumber="XXXXXXXX2222"/>
    </DiscoveredAccounts>
    <DiscoveredAccounts>
        <Account FIType="DEPOSIT" accType="SAVINGS" accRefNumber="SBI11111111" maskedAccNumber="XXXXXXX1111"/>
    </DiscoveredAccounts>
</AccDiscoveryResponse>




Account Linking


For simulation purpose, the customer account authentication is TOKEN based and an OTP is sent to the mobile no of the account holder. 


HTTP METHOD: 
PUT


URL: 
http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/Accounts/link


Request Body


<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<AccLinkRequest xmlns="https://standards.rebit.org.in/aa" ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-05-09T17:51:18.412Z" callbackURL="string" txnid="f35761ac-4a18-11e8-96ff-0277a9fbfedc">
    <AccDetails>
        <Accounts>
  <Account FIType="DEPOSIT" accType="SAVINGS" accRefNumber="HDFC11111111" maskedAccNumber="HDFC22222222"/>
        </Accounts>
        <Accounts>
 <Account FIType="DEPOSIT" accType="SAVINGS" accRefNumber="HDFC22222222" maskedAccNumber="HDFC22222222"/>
        </Accounts>
        <FIPDetails id="fipHDFC555" name="HDFC"></FIPDetails>
    </AccDetails>
</AccLinkRequest>




Response Expected: 


<AccLinkResponse ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-09-22T06:13:30.967+0000" txnid="f35761ac-4a18-11e8-96ff-0277a9fbfedc">
    <AuthenticatorType>TOKEN</AuthenticatorType>
    <AccountsLinkingRefNumber>b4bee7d2-58c3-4170-8db1-c811490b864f</AccountsLinkingRefNumber>
</AccLinkResponse>




Account Confirm Token


HTTP METHOD: 
POST


URL: 
http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/Accounts/confirm-token


Request Body


Put the SMS received on mobile in 
{OTP sms}


<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ConfirmLinkingRequest ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-05-05T10:27:17.699Z" txnid="410c2d2e-4a1e-11e8-960e-0277a9fbfedc">
    <Accounts>
        <Account FIType="DEPOSIT" accType="SAVINGS" accRefNumber="HDFC11111111" maskedAccNumber="XXXXXXX1212"/>
    </Accounts>
    <Accounts>
 <Account FIType="DEPOSIT" accType="CURRENT" accRefNumber="HDFC22222222" maskedAccNumber="XXXXXXX1313"/>
    </Accounts>
    <token>071092</token>
    <AccountsLinkingRefNumber>b4bee7d2-58c3-4170-8db1-c811490b864f</AccountsLinkingRefNumber>
</ConfirmLinkingRequest>




Response Expected: 


<ConfirmLinkingResponse ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-05-05T10:27:17.699+0000" txnid="410c2d2e-4a1e-11e8-960e-0277a9fbfedc"/>




FI request


HTTP METHOD: 
POST


URL: 
http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/FI/request


Request Body


<FIRequest ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-06-09T09:58:50.505Z" txnid="c5a1450c-d08a-45b4-a475-0468bd10e380">
    <DataConsumer id="123456@finvu.in" type="AA" callbackURL="localhost:9090/AA/Test"></DataConsumer>
    <DateTimeRange from="2018-11-27T06:26:29.761Z" to="2018-11-27T06:26:29.761Z">
    </DateTimeRange>
    <Consent id="1f6a52e8-dab8-4bf9-9191-ee1729f36e09"></Consent>
    <KeyMaterials>
            <KeyMaterial startTime="2018-06-01T09:58:50.505Z" cryptoAlg="ECDHE" curve="Curve25519" params="string">
                <Session sessionId="caa2f259-2dc2-4075-87aa-6d81018b6183" status="string"></Session>
                <DHPublicKey expiry="2019-06-01T09:58:50.505Z">
                    <Parameters>Param 1</Parameters>
                    <KeyValue>W0C9Z43fLvtE1ab6itHiZy/5Cc4zvh8r80YQc0ezqAo=</KeyValue>
                </DHPublicKey>
                <Nonce>12345</Nonce>
                <Signature> Signature Value</Signature>
            </KeyMaterial>
    </KeyMaterials>
</FIRequest>




Response Expected: 


<FIResponse ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-11-27T06:41:32.988+0000" txnid="c5a1450c-d08a-45b4-a475-0468bd10e380">
    <Consent id="1f6a52e8-dab8-4bf9-9191-ee1729f36e09"/>
    <Sessions>
        <Session sessionId="0951e004-7ed4-4d63-b373-e97e86c000ff" status="string"/>
    </Sessions>
</FIResponse>




FI Fetch


HTTP METHOD: 
POST


URL: 
http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/FI/fetch/{SessionID}


Request Body


<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<FetchFIRequest xmlns="http://https//standards.rebit.org.in/aa" ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-05-09T18:14:25.305Z" txnid="af5b8023-aabc-4a46-8f37-d3c167129b1e">
    <Consent id="1f6a52e8-dab8-4bf9-9191-ee1729f36e09"></Consent>
</FetchFIRequest>

Notification


HTTP METHOD: 
POST


URL: 
http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/Notification


Request Body


<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Notification xmlns="http://standards.rebit.org.in/aa" ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-06-16T06:54:54.435Z" txnid="eccdfcb0-a7aa-4168-9634-aba34ac5e086">
    <From type="string" value="string" name="string" id="123456@finvu.in"/>
    <To type="string" value="string" name="string" id="123456@finvu.in"/>
    <Event type="CONSENT-REVOKED"/>
    <Consent id="fd65ec71-db15-4ef4-b2dd-ec29090c6473"></Consent>
    <Payload>string</Payload>
</Notification>




Response Expected: 


200 OK




Heartbeat


HTTP METHOD: 
POST


URL: 
http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/Heartbeat


Request Body


No Request Body expected




Response Expected: 


<HeartbeatResponse ver="1.0">
    <timestamp>2018-06-25T22:58:01.000+0000</timestamp>
    <Error errMsg="OK" errCode="200"/>
    <Status>UP</Status>
</HeartbeatResponse>
docs.title: FIP API (Simulator)

docs.text: This is a simulator implementation of the FIP API and can be used for testing the Account Aggregator flows as part of the ecosystem.
docs.title: FIP API (Simulator)

docs.text: Below  http  headers need to be set as part of each request     Key  Value      content-Type  application/xml    aa_api_key  Please email us on info@cookiejar.co.in for obtaining the key
docs.title: Request headers

docs.text: The API URL to be used is  <Root API Endpoint>/<FIP API>  as per ReBIT FIP API Specs.
docs.title: API Request

docs.text:
HTTP METHOD:  POST  URL:  http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/Accounts/discover  Request Body  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<AccDiscoveryRequest xmlns="https://standards.rebit.org.in/aa" ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-05-22T17:30:15.239Z" 
txnid="8399263c-4a15-11e8-bcd1-0277a9fbfedc">
    <Customer id="cust123">
    </Customer>
    <Identifiers>
        <Identifier category="STRONG" type="MOBILE" value="7030608902"></Identifier></Identifiers>
    <FIPDetails name="HDFC" id="fipHDFC555">
        <FITypes>
            <FIType name="DEPOSIT" value="string"></FIType>
        </FITypes>
    </FIPDetails>
    <Meta type="PERSON" value="string">
        <DeviceInfo>
            <Tag name="MOBILE" value="string"></Tag>
            <Tag1 name="GEOCODE" value="string"></Tag1>
            <Tag3 name="LOCATION" value="string"></Tag3>
            <Tag4 name="IP" value="string"></Tag4>
            <Tag5 name="TYPE" value="string"></Tag5>
            <Tag6 name="ID" value="string"></Tag6>
            <Tag7 name="OS" value="string"></Tag7>
            <Tag8 name="APP" value="string"></Tag8>
            <Tag9 name="CAPABILITY" value="string"></Tag9>
            <Tag10 name="TELECOM" value="string"></Tag10>
        </DeviceInfo>
    </Meta>
</AccDiscoveryRequest>  Response Expected:   <AccDiscoveryResponse ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-05-22T17:30:15.239+0000" txnid="8399263c-4a15-11e8-bcd1-0277a9fbfedc">
    <AuthenticatorType>TOKEN</AuthenticatorType>
    <DiscoveredAccounts>
        <Account FIType="DEPOSIT" accType="SAVINGS" accRefNumber="HDFC11111111" maskedAccNumber="XXXXXXXX1111"/>
    </DiscoveredAccounts>
    <DiscoveredAccounts>
        <Account FIType="DEPOSIT" accType="CURRENT" accRefNumber="HDFC22222222" maskedAccNumber="XXXXXXXX2222"/>
    </DiscoveredAccounts>
    <DiscoveredAccounts>
        <Account FIType="DEPOSIT" accType="SAVINGS" accRefNumber="SBI11111111" maskedAccNumber="XXXXXXX1111"/>
    </DiscoveredAccounts>
</AccDiscoveryResponse>
docs.title: Account Discover

docs.text:
For simulation purpose, the customer account authentication is TOKEN based and an OTP is sent to the mobile no of the account holder.   HTTP METHOD:  PUT  URL:  http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/Accounts/link  Request Body  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<AccLinkRequest xmlns="https://standards.rebit.org.in/aa" ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-05-09T17:51:18.412Z" callbackURL="string" txnid="f35761ac-4a18-11e8-96ff-0277a9fbfedc">
    <AccDetails>
        <Accounts>
  <Account FIType="DEPOSIT" accType="SAVINGS" accRefNumber="HDFC11111111" maskedAccNumber="HDFC22222222"/>
        </Accounts>
        <Accounts>
 <Account FIType="DEPOSIT" accType="SAVINGS" accRefNumber="HDFC22222222" maskedAccNumber="HDFC22222222"/>
        </Accounts>
        <FIPDetails id="fipHDFC555" name="HDFC"></FIPDetails>
    </AccDetails>
</AccLinkRequest>  Response Expected:   <AccLinkResponse ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-09-22T06:13:30.967+0000" txnid="f35761ac-4a18-11e8-96ff-0277a9fbfedc">
    <AuthenticatorType>TOKEN</AuthenticatorType>
    <AccountsLinkingRefNumber>b4bee7d2-58c3-4170-8db1-c811490b864f</AccountsLinkingRefNumber>
</AccLinkResponse>
docs.title: Account Linking

docs.text:
HTTP METHOD:  POST  URL:  http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/Accounts/confirm-token  Request Body  Put the SMS received on mobile in  {OTP sms}  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ConfirmLinkingRequest ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-05-05T10:27:17.699Z" txnid="410c2d2e-4a1e-11e8-960e-0277a9fbfedc">
    <Accounts>
        <Account FIType="DEPOSIT" accType="SAVINGS" accRefNumber="HDFC11111111" maskedAccNumber="XXXXXXX1212"/>
    </Accounts>
    <Accounts>
 <Account FIType="DEPOSIT" accType="CURRENT" accRefNumber="HDFC22222222" maskedAccNumber="XXXXXXX1313"/>
    </Accounts>
    <token>071092</token>
    <AccountsLinkingRefNumber>b4bee7d2-58c3-4170-8db1-c811490b864f</AccountsLinkingRefNumber>
</ConfirmLinkingRequest>  Response Expected:   <ConfirmLinkingResponse ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-05-05T10:27:17.699+0000" txnid="410c2d2e-4a1e-11e8-960e-0277a9fbfedc"/>
docs.title: Account Confirm Token

docs.text:
HTTP METHOD:  POST  URL:  http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/FI/request  Request Body  <FIRequest ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-06-09T09:58:50.505Z" txnid="c5a1450c-d08a-45b4-a475-0468bd10e380">
    <DataConsumer id="123456@finvu.in" type="AA" callbackURL="localhost:9090/AA/Test"></DataConsumer>
    <DateTimeRange from="2018-11-27T06:26:29.761Z" to="2018-11-27T06:26:29.761Z">
    </DateTimeRange>
    <Consent id="1f6a52e8-dab8-4bf9-9191-ee1729f36e09"></Consent>
    <KeyMaterials>
            <KeyMaterial startTime="2018-06-01T09:58:50.505Z" cryptoAlg="ECDHE" curve="Curve25519" params="string">
                <Session sessionId="caa2f259-2dc2-4075-87aa-6d81018b6183" status="string"></Session>
                <DHPublicKey expiry="2019-06-01T09:58:50.505Z">
                    <Parameters>Param 1</Parameters>
                    <KeyValue>W0C9Z43fLvtE1ab6itHiZy/5Cc4zvh8r80YQc0ezqAo=</KeyValue>
                </DHPublicKey>
                <Nonce>12345</Nonce>
                <Signature> Signature Value</Signature>
            </KeyMaterial>
    </KeyMaterials>
</FIRequest>  Response Expected:   <FIResponse ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-11-27T06:41:32.988+0000" txnid="c5a1450c-d08a-45b4-a475-0468bd10e380">
    <Consent id="1f6a52e8-dab8-4bf9-9191-ee1729f36e09"/>
    <Sessions>
        <Session sessionId="0951e004-7ed4-4d63-b373-e97e86c000ff" status="string"/>
    </Sessions>
</FIResponse>
docs.title: FI request

docs.text:
HTTP METHOD:  POST  URL:  http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1/FI/fetch/{SessionID}  Request Body  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

docs.text:
FIP Data API


This API can be used to add sample data for accounts and associated transactions and can be called from an appropriate testing tool such as 
Postman


Adding User Account




















URL


http://api.finvu.in/Accounts/add






HTTP METHOD


POST








Request Body


<UserAccountInfo>
  <FIPDetails id="fipHDFC555" name="HDFC" authenticatorType="TOKEN" fipAccessToken="fip_api_key" fipEndpointUri="http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1">
    <UserAccount accountRefNo="HDFC11111111" accountNo="HDFC11111111" accountTypeEnum="SAVINGS" FIType="DEPOSIT">
      <Identifiers pan="AFYPA24444" mobile="7030608902" email="info@cookiejar.co.in" aadhar="679486011111"></Identifiers> 
    </UserAccount>
    <UserAccount accountRefNo="HDFC22222222" accountNo="HDFC22222222" accountTypeEnum="CURRENT" FIType="DEPOSIT">
      <Identifiers pan="AFYPA24444" mobile="7030608902" email="info@cookiejar.co.in" aadhar="679486011111"></Identifiers> 
    </UserAccount>
  </FIPDetails>
  <FIPDetails id="fipSBI4545" name="SBI" authenticatorType="DIRECT" fipAccessToken="fip_api_key" fipEndpointUri="http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1">
    <UserAccount accountRefNo="SBI11111111" accountNo="SBI11111111" accountTypeEnum="SAVINGS" FIType="DEPOSIT">
      <Identifiers pan="AFYPA24444" mobile="7030608902" email="info@cookiejar.co.in" aadhar="679486011111"></Identifiers> 
    </UserAccount>
  </FIPDetails>
</UserAccountInfo>




Response Expected: 


User account(s) added.

  Account Reference Number : HDFC11111111
  Account Number : HDFC11111111
  Consent Id : 1f6a52e8-dab8-4bf9-9191-ee1729f36e09
  FIP Name : HDFC
  FIP Id : fipHDFC555  (It use in Account Discovery.)


  Account Reference Number : HDFC22222222
  Account Number : HDFC22222222
  Consent Id : d1c99586-96d5-4529-b5be-4c27e1807522
  FIP Name : HDFC
  FIP Id : fipHDFC555  (It use in Account Discovery.)


  Account Reference Number : SBI11111111
  Account Number : SBI11111111
  Consent Id : fa29ba18-1214-4a4d-aa58-608f82f63976
  FIP Name : SBI
  FIP Id : fipSBI4545  (It use in Account Discovery.)

 Please save this information for FI request API calls.




Adding User Account Transaction




















URL


http://api.finvu.in/Accounts/Transaction/add






HTTP METHOD


POST








Request Body


<UserAccountTrans>
        <UserAccount> 
            <accountRefNo>RefHDFC0001</accountRefNo> 
            <accountNo>HDFC111111111111</accountNo> 
            <FIType>DEPOSIT</FIType>
            <accountTypeEnum>SAVINGS</accountTypeEnum>
            <accountData>
    <![CDATA[
      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
      <Account xmlns="http://api.rebit.org.in/FISchema/deposit" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://api.rebit.org.in/FISchema/deposit ../FISchema/deposit.xsd" id="accountNumber" type="deposit">
    <Summary type="current" openingDate="2002-09-24" ifscCode="AIRP0000001" micrCode="" branch="" facility="OD" currentBalance=""    currentODLimit="">
          <Holders type="single">
    <Holder order="1|2" name="" aadhaar="123456789012" mobile="" landline="" address="" email="qw.1234@co.in" pan="AAAPL1234C"/></Holders>
    </Summary>
    <Transactions startDate="2002-09-24" endDate="2002-09-24">
          <Transaction id="" date="2002-09-24" narration="" reference="" amount="800" balance="90"/>
  </Transactions>
      </Account>
    ]]>
            </accountData>
        </UserAccount>
</UserAccountTrans>




Response Expected: 


User account transaction added.
docs.title: FIP Data API

docs.text: This API can be used to add sample data for accounts and associated transactions and can be called from an appropriate testing tool such as  Postman

docs.text:
URL  http://api.finvu.in/Accounts/add    HTTP METHOD  POST     Request Body  <UserAccountInfo>
  <FIPDetails id="fipHDFC555" name="HDFC" authenticatorType="TOKEN" fipAccessToken="fip_api_key" fipEndpointUri="http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1">
    <UserAccount accountRefNo="HDFC11111111" accountNo="HDFC11111111" accountTypeEnum="SAVINGS" FIType="DEPOSIT">

    </UserAccount>
  </FIPDetails>
  <FIPDetails id="fipSBI4545" name="SBI" authenticatorType="DIRECT" fipAccessToken="fip_api_key" fipEndpointUri="http://api.finvu.in/ConnectHub/V1">

 Please save this information for FI request API calls.

docs.text:
AA API Sandbox


This is a Sandbox implementation of the AA API and can be used for testing the Account Aggregator flows as part of the ecosystem. 


Request headers


Below 
http
 headers need to be set as part of each request








Key


Value










content-Type


application/xml






aa_api_key


Please email us on info@cookiejar.co.in for obtaining the key








API Request


The API URL to be used is 
<Root API Endpoint>/<FIP API>
 as per ReBIT AA API Specs.


Consents


This API is intended for AA Client to request generation of digitally signed consent artefacts.


HTTP METHOD: 
POST


URL: 
http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/Consents


Request Body


<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ConsentsRequest xmlns="http://standards.rebit.org.in/aa" ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-07-07T06:49:32.606Z" txnid="4a4adbbe-29ae-11e8-a8d7-0289437bf331">
    <FIP id="fip-1"></FIP>
    <FIU id="fiu-1"></FIU>
    <AA id="aa-1"></AA>
    <Customer idTypes="string" id="string"></Customer>
    <FITypes>
        <FIType>DEPOSIT</FIType>
    </FITypes>
    <Data-Items>
        <Data id="string" type="TRANSACTIONAL">
            <Access mode="STORE"></Access>
            <DateTimeRange from="2017-07-13T11:33:34.509Z" to="2018-07-13T11:33:34.509Z"></DateTimeRange>
            <DataLife unit="MONTH" value="string"></DataLife>
            <Frequency unit="DAILY"></Frequency>
            <Datafilter></Datafilter>
        </Data>
    </Data-Items>
    <ConsentUse logUri="string"></ConsentUse>
    <DataAccess logUri="string"></DataAccess>
    <Purpose code="string" refUri="string" text="string">
        <Category type="string"></Category>
    </Purpose>
    <Signature>c3RyaW5n</Signature>
</ConsentsRequest>




Response Expected: 


<ConsentsResponse ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-07-07T06:49:32.606+0000" id="string" type="string">
    <ConsentsHandle>e2376170-0e47-4e67-9ceb-66073bac393d</ConsentsHandle>
</ConsentsResponse>




Consents/{consentsHandle}


This API is intended for checking the status of a previously submitted Consent Artefacts creation request


HTTP METHOD: 
GET


URL: 
http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/Consents/{consentsHandle}


Request Body


No Request Body expected




Response Expected: 


<ConsentStatus ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-07-07T06:49:32.606+0000">
    <ConsentsHandle>e2376170-0e47-4e67-9ceb-66073bac393d</ConsentsHandle>
    <Status/>
    <Consents>
        <Consents/></Consents>
</ConsentStatus>




Consents/{id}


This API is intended for fetching the information associated with the specific consent.


HTTP METHOD: 
GET


URL: 
http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/Consents/Consent/{id}


Request Body


No Request Body expected




Response Expected: 


<ConsentArtefact ver="1.0" id="c4a1450c-d08a-45b4-a475-0468bd10e380" createTime="2018-10-08T09:29:23.034+0000" startTime="2018-10-08T09:29:23.034+0000" expireTime="2020-07-07T05:48:14.000+0000">
    <FIP id="fip@sbi.co.in"/>
    <AA id="123456@finvu.in"/>
    <User idTypes="MOBILE" id="9822289017"/>
    <Account FIType="DEPOSIT" FIPId="fip@sbi.co.in" accType="SAVINGS" accRefNumber="SBI123456" maskedAccNumber="SBI111111111111"/>
    <Data-Items>
        <Data id="data123" type="PROFILE">
            <Access mode="VIEW"/>
            <DateTimeRange from="2017-07-13T06:03:34.000+0000" to="2018-07-13T06:03:34.000+0000"/>
            <DataLife value="data_life_value"/>
            <Frequency unit="MONTHLY"/>
            <Datafilter/>
        </Data>
    </Data-Items>
    <ConsentUse logUri="consent_use_loguri"/>
    <DataAccess logUri="dataaccess_loguri"/>
    <Purpose code="consent_purpose_code" refUri="consent_purpose_refuri" text="consent_purpose_free_text">
        <Category type="type"/>
    </Purpose>
    <Signature>AA signature</Signature>
</ConsentArtefact>




/FI/request


The FIU or the User submits the Consent IDs of the consents required for fetching financial information from the FIP(s).


HTTP METHOD: 
consent_purpose_free_text


URL: 
http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/FI/request


Request Body


<FIRequest timestamp="2018-07-10T15:04:39.066Z" ver="v1.0" txnid="e8cc6822-d4bb-4eb1-9e1b-4996fbff8acb">
    <DataConsumer id="string" type="FIU" callbackURL="string"></DataConsumer>
    <DateTimeRange from="2017-10-08T11:00:34.169Z" to="2018-10-08T11:00:34.169Z"></DateTimeRange>
    <FIRequestParams>
        <Consent id="c4a1450c-d08a-45b4-a475-0468bd10e380" status="READY"></Consent>
        <KeyMaterials>
            <KeyMaterial startTime="2018-10-08T11:00:34.169Z" cryptoAlg="ECDHE" curve="Curve25519" params="string">
                <Session sessionId="caa2f259-2dc2-4075-87aa-6d81018b6183" status="string"></Session>
                <DHPublicKey expiry="1531236622970">
                    <Parameters>params</Parameters>
                    <KeyValue>keyvalue</KeyValue>
                </DHPublicKey>
                <Nonce>0</Nonce>
                <Signature>signature12</Signature>
            </KeyMaterial>
        </KeyMaterials>
    </FIRequestParams>
</FIRequest>




Response Expected: 


<FIResponse ver="v1.0" timestamp="2018-10-13T09:29:08.243+0000" txnid="e8cc6822-d4bb-4eb1-9e1b-4996fbff8acb">
    <ScheduledFIRequests>
        <ScheduledFIRequest>
            <Consent id="c4a1450c-d08a-45b4-a475-0468bd10e380"/>
            <Sessions>
                <Sessions sessionId="2fc5d57b-34fa-485d-a1d4-240f8bf36dc3"/></Sessions>
        </ScheduledFIRequest>
    </ScheduledFIRequests>
</FIResponse>




/FI/fetch/{sessionId}


Once FIU receives the notification 
 from AA, using digitally signed consent request received from AA, this API can be used to fetch the financial information from the AA.


HTTP METHOD: 
POST


URL: 
http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/FI/fetch/{sessionId}


Request Body


<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<FetchFIRequest xmlns="http://https//standards.rebit.org.in/aa" ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-05-09T18:14:25.305Z" txnid="af5b8023-aabc-4a46-8f37-d3c167129b1e">
    <ConsentID>c4a1450c-d08a-45b4-a475-0468bd10e380</ConsentID>
</FetchFIRequest>




Response Expected: 


<FIFetchResponse>
    <Session sessionId="d07d6e93-0e3d-489f-92fd-ec6a5523fd82"/>
    <KeyMaterial startTime="2018-05-31T22:58:50.000+0000" cryptoAlg="cryptoAlg" curve="Curve" params="key param">
        <Session sessionId="string"/>
        <DHPublicKey expiry="2019-05-31T22:58:50.000+0000">
            <Parameters>parameters</Parameters>
            <KeyValue>W0C9Z43fLvtE1ab6itHiZy/5Cc4zvh8r80YQc0ezqAo=</KeyValue>
        </DHPublicKey>
        <Nonce>123</Nonce>
        <Signature>Signature Value</Signature>
    </KeyMaterial>
    <FIs>
        <FI>
            <EncryptedData/>
            <Account FIType="DEPOSIT" FIPId="fip@sbi.co.in" accType="SAVINGS" accRefNumber="SBI123456" maskedAccNumber="SBI111111111111"/>
        </FI>
    </FIs>
</FIFetchResponse>




Notification


API handles the notifications corresponding to the events generated during consent flow and data flow.


HTTP METHOD: 
POST


URL: 
http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/Notification


Request Body


<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Notification xmlns="http://standards.rebit.org.in/aa" ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-07-06T04:37:19.509Z" txnid="0b811819-9044-4856-b0ee-8c88035f8858">
    <From type="string" value="string" name="SBI" id="fip123"></From>
    <To type="string" value="string" name="string" id="string"></To>
    <Event type="FI-READY"></Event>
    <Consent id="687c3620-6bb4-43c4-9b9e-39f36c7617fb" status="string"></Consent>
    <Session sessionId="9afdacdd-215b-4c17-af18-cdccebfb7d1a" status="string"></Session>
    <Payload>string</Payload>
</Notification>




Response Expected: 


200 OK




Heartbeat


This API is used by FIUs to check availability of AAs.


HTTP METHOD: 
GET


URL: 
http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/Heartbeat


Request Body


No Request Body expected




Response Expected: 


<HeartbeatResponse ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-06-26T04:28:01.000+0000">
    <Error errMsg="OK" errCode="200"/>
    <Status>UP</Status>
</HeartbeatResponse>
docs.title: AA API Sandbox

docs.text: This is a Sandbox implementation of the AA API and can be used for testing the Account Aggregator flows as part of the ecosystem.
docs.title: AA API Sandbox

docs.text: Below  http  headers need to be set as part of each request     Key  Value      content-Type  application/xml    aa_api_key  Please email us on info@cookiejar.co.in for obtaining the key
docs.title: Request headers

docs.text: The API URL to be used is  <Root API Endpoint>/<FIP API>  as per ReBIT AA API Specs.
docs.title: API Request

docs.text:
This API is intended for AA Client to request generation of digitally signed consent artefacts.  HTTP METHOD:  POST  URL:  http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/Consents  Request Body  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ConsentsRequest xmlns="http://standards.rebit.org.in/aa" ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-07-07T06:49:32.606Z" txnid="4a4adbbe-29ae-11e8-a8d7-0289437bf331">
    <FIP id="fip-1"></FIP>
    <FIU id="fiu-1"></FIU>
    <AA id="aa-1"></AA>
    <Customer idTypes="string" id="string"></Customer>
    <FITypes>
        <FIType>DEPOSIT</FIType>
    </FITypes>
    <Data-Items>
        <Data id="string" type="TRANSACTIONAL">
            <Access mode="STORE"></Access>
            <DateTimeRange from="2017-07-13T11:33:34.509Z" to="2018-07-13T11:33:34.509Z"></DateTimeRange>
            <DataLife unit="MONTH" value="string"></DataLife>
            <Frequency unit="DAILY"></Frequency>
            <Datafilter></Datafilter>
        </Data>
    </Data-Items>
    <ConsentUse logUri="string"></ConsentUse>
    <DataAccess logUri="string"></DataAccess>
    <Purpose code="string" refUri="string" text="string">
        <Category type="string"></Category>
    </Purpose>
    <Signature>c3RyaW5n</Signature>
</ConsentsRequest>  Response Expected:   <ConsentsResponse ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-07-07T06:49:32.606+0000" id="string" type="string">
    <ConsentsHandle>e2376170-0e47-4e67-9ceb-66073bac393d</ConsentsHandle>
</ConsentsResponse>
docs.title: Consents

docs.text:
This API is intended for checking the status of a previously submitted Consent Artefacts creation request  HTTP METHOD:  GET  URL:  http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/Consents/{consentsHandle}  Request Body  No Request Body expected  Response Expected:   <ConsentStatus ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-07-07T06:49:32.606+0000">
    <ConsentsHandle>e2376170-0e47-4e67-9ceb-66073bac393d</ConsentsHandle>
    <Status/>
    <Consents>
        <Consents/></Consents>
</ConsentStatus>
docs.title: Consents/{consentsHandle}

docs.text:
This API is intended for fetching the information associated with the specific consent.  HTTP METHOD:  GET  URL:  http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/Consents/Consent/{id}  Request Body  No Request Body expected  Response Expected:   <ConsentArtefact ver="1.0" id="c4a1450c-d08a-45b4-a475-0468bd10e380" createTime="2018-10-08T09:29:23.034+0000" startTime="2018-10-08T09:29:23.034+0000" expireTime="2020-07-07T05:48:14.000+0000">
    <FIP id="fip@sbi.co.in"/>
    <AA id="123456@finvu.in"/>
    <User idTypes="MOBILE" id="9822289017"/>
    <Account FIType="DEPOSIT" FIPId="fip@sbi.co.in" accType="SAVINGS" accRefNumber="SBI123456" maskedAccNumber="SBI111111111111"/>
    <Data-Items>
        <Data id="data123" type="PROFILE">
            <Access mode="VIEW"/>
            <DateTimeRange from="2017-07-13T06:03:34.000+0000" to="2018-07-13T06:03:34.000+0000"/>
            <DataLife value="data_life_value"/>
            <Frequency unit="MONTHLY"/>
            <Datafilter/>
        </Data>
    </Data-Items>
    <ConsentUse logUri="consent_use_loguri"/>
    <DataAccess logUri="dataaccess_loguri"/>
    <Purpose code="consent_purpose_code" refUri="consent_purpose_refuri" text="consent_purpose_free_text">
        <Category type="type"/>
    </Purpose>
    <Signature>AA signature</Signature>
</ConsentArtefact>
docs.title: Consents/{id}

docs.text:
The FIU or the User submits the Consent IDs of the consents required for fetching financial information from the FIP(s).  HTTP METHOD:  consent_purpose_free_text  URL:  http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/FI/request  Request Body  <FIRequest timestamp="2018-07-10T15:04:39.066Z" ver="v1.0" txnid="e8cc6822-d4bb-4eb1-9e1b-4996fbff8acb">
    <DataConsumer id="string" type="FIU" callbackURL="string"></DataConsumer>
    <DateTimeRange from="2017-10-08T11:00:34.169Z" to="2018-10-08T11:00:34.169Z"></DateTimeRange>
    <FIRequestParams>
        <Consent id="c4a1450c-d08a-45b4-a475-0468bd10e380" status="READY"></Consent>
        <KeyMaterials>
            <KeyMaterial startTime="2018-10-08T11:00:34.169Z" cryptoAlg="ECDHE" curve="Curve25519" params="string">
                <Session sessionId="caa2f259-2dc2-4075-87aa-6d81018b6183" status="string"></Session>
                <DHPublicKey expiry="1531236622970">
                    <Parameters>params</Parameters>
                    <KeyValue>keyvalue</KeyValue>
                </DHPublicKey>
                <Nonce>0</Nonce>
                <Signature>signature12</Signature>
            </KeyMaterial>
        </KeyMaterials>
    </FIRequestParams>
</FIRequest>  Response Expected:   <FIResponse ver="v1.0" timestamp="2018-10-13T09:29:08.243+0000" txnid="e8cc6822-d4bb-4eb1-9e1b-4996fbff8acb">
    <ScheduledFIRequests>
        <ScheduledFIRequest>
            <Consent id="c4a1450c-d08a-45b4-a475-0468bd10e380"/>
            <Sessions>
                <Sessions sessionId="2fc5d57b-34fa-485d-a1d4-240f8bf36dc3"/></Sessions>
        </ScheduledFIRequest>
    </ScheduledFIRequests>
</FIResponse>
docs.title: /FI/request

docs.text:
Once FIU receives the notification   from AA, using digitally signed consent request received from AA, this API can be used to fetch the financial information from the AA.  HTTP METHOD:  POST  URL:  http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/FI/fetch/{sessionId}  Request Body  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<FetchFIRequest xmlns="http://https//standards.rebit.org.in/aa" ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-05-09T18:14:25.305Z" txnid="af5b8023-aabc-4a46-8f37-d3c167129b1e">
    <ConsentID>c4a1450c-d08a-45b4-a475-0468bd10e380</ConsentID>
</FetchFIRequest>  Response Expected:   <FIFetchResponse>
    <Session sessionId="d07d6e93-0e3d-489f-92fd-ec6a5523fd82"/>
    <KeyMaterial startTime="2018-05-31T22:58:50.000+0000" cryptoAlg="cryptoAlg" curve="Curve" params="key param">
        <Session sessionId="string"/>
        <DHPublicKey expiry="2019-05-31T22:58:50.000+0000">
            <Parameters>parameters</Parameters>
            <KeyValue>W0C9Z43fLvtE1ab6itHiZy/5Cc4zvh8r80YQc0ezqAo=</KeyValue>
        </DHPublicKey>
        <Nonce>123</Nonce>
        <Signature>Signature Value</Signature>
    </KeyMaterial>
    <FIs>
        <FI>
            <EncryptedData/>
            <Account FIType="DEPOSIT" FIPId="fip@sbi.co.in" accType="SAVINGS" accRefNumber="SBI123456" maskedAccNumber="SBI111111111111"/>
        </FI>
    </FIs>
</FIFetchResponse>
docs.title: /FI/fetch/{sessionId}

docs.text:
API handles the notifications corresponding to the events generated during consent flow and data flow.  HTTP METHOD:  POST  URL:  http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/Notification  Request Body  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Notification xmlns="http://standards.rebit.org.in/aa" ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-07-06T04:37:19.509Z" txnid="0b811819-9044-4856-b0ee-8c88035f8858">
    <From type="string" value="string" name="SBI" id="fip123"></From>
    <To type="string" value="string" name="string" id="string"></To>
    <Event type="FI-READY"></Event>
    <Consent id="687c3620-6bb4-43c4-9b9e-39f36c7617fb" status="string"></Consent>
    <Session sessionId="9afdacdd-215b-4c17-af18-cdccebfb7d1a" status="string"></Session>
    <Payload>string</Payload>
</Notification>  Response Expected:   200 OK
docs.title: Notification

docs.text:
This API is used by FIUs to check availability of AAs.  HTTP METHOD:  GET  URL:  http://aa.finvu.in/API/V1/Heartbeat  Request Body  No Request Body expected  Response Expected:   <HeartbeatResponse ver="1.0" timestamp="2018-06-26T04:28:01.000+0000">
    <Error errMsg="OK" errCode="200"/>
    <Status>UP</Status>
</HeartbeatResponse>
docs.title: Heartbeat
